abstract: The departure of Richard F. Zannino, Dow Jones’s chief executive, was announced Thursday, a week before News Corporation is expected to take control of the company.
snippet: The departure of Richard F. Zannino, Dow Jones’s chief executive, was announced Thursday, a week before News Corporation is expected to take control of the company.
lead_paragraph: With a week to go before the News Corporation takes control of Dow Jones & Company, there are already management changes under way at the top of Dow Jones.

headline.main: Murdoch Said to Have Plan for Shake-Up at Dow Jones
headline.print_headline: Murdoch Said to Have Plan For Shake-Up at Dow Jones

abstract: Vikram Pandit’s star has been rising ever since he joined Citigroup in July. But Old Lane Partners, the hedge fund that he co-founded and that Citigroup bought earlier this year, hasn’t enjoyed the same kind of success, according to Dow Jones.
lead_paragraph: Vikram Pandit’s star has been rising ever since he joined Citigroup in July. But Old Lane Partners, the hedge fund that he co-founded and that Citigroup bought earlier this year, hasn’t enjoyed the same kind of success, according to Dow Jones.

headline.main: Pandit Is Rising, but His Fund Isn’t, Report Says

abstract: With a week to go before the News Corporation takes control of Dow Jones & Company, there are already management changes under way at the top of Dow Jones — and Rupert Murdoch’s empire itself.
lead_paragraph: With a week to go before the News Corporation takes control of Dow Jones & Company, there are already management changes under way at the top of Dow Jones — and Rupert Murdoch’s empire itself.

headline.main: Shake-Ups in Dow Jones and Its Soon-to-Be Owner
